snippet: A report by the public protector’s office fell short of providing clear evidence of malfeasance by Mr. Zuma, the president, but is likely to raise pressure on him to resign....
lead_paragraph: A report by the public protector’s office fell short of providing clear evidence of malfeasance by Mr. Zuma, the president, but is likely to raise pressure on him to resign.

headline.main: Jacob Zuma’s Administration Should Be Investigated, South Africa Watchdog Says
headline.print_headline: South Africa Watchdog Seeks Inquiry Into Leadership
